text: Hey there! I'm excited to help you get started on your new project. To begin, what's your full name?
Awesome, thanks! Could you please share the best email address to reach you at?
And what's the name of your business?
Do you have a current website? If so, could you share the address with me? If not, just type 'none'.
Will anyone else from your team be involved in this project? If so, who are the key people I should know about?
Tell me a bit about your business. What industry are you in, and how would you describe what you do?
What's your secret sauce? What makes your business stand out from the competition?
What's the main thing you're hoping to achieve with us at Growth99? Are you looking to get more clients, boost sales, improve your site's SEO, or something else?
Just to make sure we're on the same page for scheduling, what time zone are you in?
What's your business address? If you have more than one spot, feel free to list them all.
